scripts.start-single-source: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace computers-service start" "yarn workspace mesh-single-source start"
scripts.start-computer-inventory-source: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace computer-inventory-service start" "yarn workspace mesh-single-source start"
scripts.start-multiple-sources-prog-resolvers: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace buildings-service start" "yarn workspace computers-service start" "yarn workspace multiple-sources-prog-resolvers start"
scripts.start-inventory-sources: concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace buildings-service start" "yarn workspace computers-service start"
